Container.Overview: Docker Registry Browser - A modern web interface for browsing and managing Docker registries. Features include repository browsing, tag listing, image details inspection, and push command generation.

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Port for accessing the web interface

Config.Name: Registry Host
Config.Description: Docker registry host and port (e.g., localhost:5000, registry.example.com:5000)

Config.Name: Registry Protocol
Config.Description: Protocol to use for registry connection (http or https)

Config.Name: Registry Username
Config.Description: Username for registry authentication (leave empty for no auth)

Config.Name: Registry Password
Config.Description: Password for registry authentication (leave empty for no auth)
